description:
The Derrick Law Firm protects the rights of people who have been injured in South Carolina. We know that suffering an unexpected injury can throw your life into a whirlpool of challenges, and we are dedicated to helping you hold the negligent party financially accountable.

During a free initial consultation, we gather information about your accident and injuries, and explain to you the types of compensation that you may be able to claim. We handle a wide range of cases, including accidents involving motorcycles, other cars, tractor trailers, boats and jet skis; work-related injuries and illnesses; wrongful death; defective products; assaults; and bad faith insurance. Additionally, our law firm is experienced with brain and spinal cord injuries, and we have a deep understanding of the complications these types of injuries can have later on. We use that knowledge to determine an amount of compensation that will meet your needs as time passes.

If you have any questions about your case, our staff is there to answer them. We keep you updated about the current status of your claim, and we explain to you what your rights are according to state and federal laws. If your claim is denied, we will assist you through the process of appealing that decision. If your initial claim cannot be peacefully settled, The Derrick Law Firm is prepared to take your case into a courtroom.
